    AnimalViewPanel
    A panel for viewing and managing animal information.
    Methoden in gui.animalview, die ShelterPanel zurückgeben
    Modifizierer und Typ
    Methode
    Beschreibung
    private ShelterPanel
    AnimalViewPanel.createCenterPanel()
    Creates and configures the center panel of the layout, containing input fields and labels for animal data.
    private ShelterPanel
    AnimalViewPanel.createExaminationPanel()
    Creates and configures the examination panel, similar to the incident panel, including a header, a list for examinations, and a button to add new ones.
    private ShelterPanel
    AnimalViewPanel.createIncidentPanel()
    Creates and configures the incident panel, including a header, a list to display incidents, and a button to add new incidents.
    private ShelterPanel
    AnimalViewPanel.createRightPanel()
    Creates and configures the right panel, which contains the incident and examination panels.
    private ShelterPanel
    AnimalViewPanel.initAnimalListPanel()
    Initializes the animal list displaying animals that are not yet adopted.
